issue.title: [Python][wheel] Use libzstd.a explicitly
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9123](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9123). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
`ARROW_ZSTD_USE_SHARED` is introduced by ARROW-9084. We need to set `ARROW_ZSTD_USE_SHARED=OFF` explicitly to use static zstd library.
